scenes.description: But Monica, we don't have the luxury of time. We need results now!

options.text: I understand the urgency, but we might waste more time fixing mistakes later.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Bob's urgency while emphasizing the potential consequences of rushing, showing good emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: Maybe, but ensuring accuracy now can save us from bigger issues down the line.
options.analysis: You highlighted the importance of accuracy while understanding the urgency, demonstrating a balanced emotional response.

options.text: I think reviewing our steps can actually speed up the process by preventing errors.
options.analysis: You stressed the value of careful planning to avoid errors, showing strong self-regulation and motivation.
